Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for a grace period in which former employees of the department of corrections and community supervision that participated in a strike may return to work
Summary: Provides for a grace period until July 1, 2025, in which former employees of the department of corrections and community supervision that participated in a strike may return to full duty without discipline.
ActClause: AN ACT providing for a grace period in which former employees of the department of corrections and community supervision that participated in a strike may return to work; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
